Text:
Thank you very much!
Do you know if a 1080p will be available ? :D

I can't view it with Media Player Classid (CCCP). VLC will show the video, but not the audio. WMP won't even try to open it. 

How are you folks watching it?
A bit derpy quality, but what do you expect from a first release, and is this really all of it?
@sephalon DivX. Plays high quality mkv files.

awful quality, waiting for better
but seeding for those who want it now

you guys might want to check your computers. I downloaded this the day that he released it and I just now got my computer working. The file put a wretched virus on my laptop :(

And sephalon, you can watch .mkv files using Media Player Classic - Home Cinema. Safe download and plays virtually all video files.
@twizted_rozes I dont know were you got that virus from but it wasnt this torrent mate, If it did have a virus it would kick in right away, not just kick in a while later

QUALITY SUCKS.

And no I don't give two fucks about not contributing.
